name: genai_cosmic_duck
description: Cosmic duck generation using Google AI Studio API

parameters.prompt_template: A cosmic ethereal duck floating in {setting}, surrounded by {effects}, rendered in {style} style, with {lighting} lighting

examples.prompt: A cosmic ethereal duck floating in nebula, surrounded by stardust, rendered in photorealistic style, with stellar lighting

notes: Uses Google AI Studio API with key authentication
Alternative to Vertex AI (which uses service accounts)
